title: Google Drive Sync & Access
description: Fix files not syncing, access denied errors, and 'Waiting to upload' messages.

steps.title: Restart Google Drive App
steps.instruction: Click the Drive icon in System Tray (Windows) or Menu Bar (Mac) → Settings (cogwheel) → Quit. Then restart the app from your Applications/Start menu.

steps.title: Check Storage Quota
steps.instruction: Go to drive.google.com/settings/storage. If your storage is full, syncing will stop until you delete files or upgrade.

steps.title: Disconnect/Reconnect Account
steps.instruction: Drive Settings → Preferences → Settings (cogwheel) → Disconnect Account. Then sign in again. This forces a metadata refresh.

steps.title: Check File Permissions
steps.instruction: If you can't see a file, ask the owner to check 'Share' settings. Ensure your email is added with 'Editor' or 'Viewer' rights.

steps.title: Clear Office Plugin Cache
steps.instruction: If using Drive for Desktop with Excel/Word: Clear the local cache in Drive Settings → Advanced → 'Local cached files'.
